00029 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00030 /// CTreeTraceView::CTreeTraceView
00031 ///
00032 /// @description    This is the constructor of the CTreeTraceView class. It uses
00033 ///                 parent to continue in creating the QObject tree.
00034 /// @pre            None
00035 /// @post           The default values for the stored trace, and style are set
00036 ///                 and the CTreeSelector is initialized and connected to the
00037 ///                 retrace() slot.
00038 ///
00039 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent QObject.
00040 ///
00041 /// @limitations    None
00042 ///
00043 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00044 CTreeTraceView::CTreeTraceView( QWidget *parent )
00045 : QTableWidget( parent )
00046 {
00047     m_trace = NULL;
00048     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00049 
00050     //The m_selector encapsulates all the editables in the tool bar that have to
00051     //do with the trace. AI Selector, Depth, and QS Depth. Any changes to those
00052     //three will emit the activiated() signal.
00053     m_selector = new CTreeTracerSelector( this );
00054     connect( m_selector, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT( retrace() ) );
00055 }
00056 
00057 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058 /// CTreeTraceView::~CTreeTraceView
00059 ///
00060 /// @description  This is the destructor for the CTreeTraceView class which
00061 ///               frees up dynamically allocated memory.
00062 /// @pre          None
00063 /// @post         The trace is deleted if it exists.
00064 ///
00065 /// @limitations  None
00066 ///
00067 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00068 CTreeTraceView::~CTreeTraceView()
00069 {
00070     if ( m_trace != NULL )
00071         delete m_trace;
00072 }

00151 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00152 /// CTreeTraceView::retrace
00153 ///
00154 /// @description  This function is a Qt slot. Calling it will update the trace
00155 ///               to reflect the current states of the Graph Model and the
00156 ///               Trace Selector.
00157 /// @pre          None
00158 /// @post         The trace is updated and repainted.
00159 ///
00160 /// @limitations  None
00161 ///
00162 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00163 void CTreeTraceView::retrace()
00164 {
00165     //Delete any existing trace
00166     if( m_trace != NULL )
00167         delete m_trace;
00168 
00169     //Perform the actual trace
00170     m_trace = m_selector->trace( m_graphModel->getRootNode() );
00171 
00172     //Get the string grid
00173     QList<QStringList> lines = gridFromTrace( m_trace );
00174     int rows = lines.count();
00175     int columns = m_trace->s_columnNames.count();
00176 
00177     //Update the table parameters
00178     setColumnCount(columns);
00179     setHorizontalHeaderLabels( m_trace->s_columnNames );
00180     setRowCount(rows);
00181 
00182     //For loop through the 2d array of QStrings
00183     QTableWidgetItem *item;
00184     int i,j;
00185     for( i = 0; i < rows; ++i )
00186         for( j = 0; j < columns; ++j )
00187         {
00188             //create the item, set the text, set the font, plug it in.
00189             item = new QTableWidgetItem(lines[i][j]);
00190             item->setFont( m_style->getFont() );
00191             setItem( i, j, item );
00192         }
00193 
00194     //Resize all the columns to be just the right width
00195     for( j = 0; j < columns; ++j )
00196         resizeColumnToContents(j);
00197 }
00198 
00199 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00200 /// CTreeTraceView::gridFromCall
00201 ///
00202 /// @description          This is a recursive function that returns a 2d array
00203 ///                       of QStrings that represents the trace from the call.
00204 /// @pre                  None
00205 /// @post                 The grid is returned.
00206 ///
00207 /// @param call:          This is the call to be converted to a grid of strings.
00208 ///
00209 /// @return QList<QStringList>: This is the 2d array of QString
00210 ///
00211 /// @limitations          None
00212 ///
00213 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00214 QList<QStringList> CTreeTraceView::gridFromCall( STreeCall *call )
00215 {
00216     QList<QStringList> lineGrid;
00217 
00218     SGeneralMLine *curLine;
00219     foreach( curLine, call->s_lines )
00220         lineGrid += curLine->toStringList();
00221 
00222     STreeCall *curCall;
00223     foreach( curCall, call->s_children )
00224         lineGrid += gridFromCall( curCall );
00225 
00226     return lineGrid;
00227 }
00228 
00229 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00230 /// CTreeTraceView::gridFromTrace
00231 ///
00232 /// @description          This function returns a 2d array of QStrings that
00233 ///                       represents the trace.
00234 /// @pre                  None
00235 /// @post                 The grid is returned.
00236 ///
00237 /// @param trace:         This is the trace to be converted to a grid of strings.
00238 ///
00239 /// @return QList<QStringList>: This is the 2d array of QString
00240 ///
00241 /// @limitations          None
00242 ///
00243 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00244 QList<QStringList> CTreeTraceView::gridFromTrace( STreeTrace *trace )
00245 {
00246     QList<QStringList> stringGrid;
00247 
00248     QStringList blankLine;
00249     for( int i = trace->s_columnNames.count(); i > 0; --i )
00250         blankLine.append("");
00251 
00252     STreeCall *rootCall;
00253     foreach( rootCall, trace->s_depths )
00254     {
00255         stringGrid += gridFromCall( rootCall );
00256         stringGrid += blankLine;
00257     }
00258     if( !stringGrid.isEmpty() )
00259         stringGrid.takeLast();
00260 
00261     return stringGrid;
00262 }
00263 
00264 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00265 /// CTreeTraceView::saveTrace
00266 ///
00267 /// @description  Saves the trace to a latex formatted table in a new file.
00268 /// @pre          None
00269 /// @post         The trace grid is converted to latex format and saved into a
00270 ///               .tex plain text file.
00271 ///
00272 /// @limitations  None
00273 ///
00274 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00275 void CTreeTraceView::saveTrace()
00276 {
00277     if( m_trace == NULL )
00278         return;
00279 
00280     QSettings settings;
00281 
00282     //Get the save file name from the user.
00283     QString saveFileName( QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this,
00284             "Save to LaTeX...",
00285             settings.value( "filepath" ).toString(),
00286             "LaTeX files (*.tex)" ) );
00287 
00288     //Make sure the file was valid.
00289     if (saveFileName.isEmpty())
00290         return;
00291 
00292     //Append the file extension if the user didn't add it themselves.
00293     if ( !saveFileName.endsWith(".tex", Qt::CaseInsensitive ) )
00294         saveFileName.append( ".tex" );
00295 
00296     //Open the file and exit if the file didn't open.
00297     QFile file(saveFileName);
00298     file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00299     if( !file.isOpen() )
00300     {
00301         QMessageBox::critical(this, "Error", "Could not open file for writing." );
00302         return;
00303     }
00304     QTextStream stream(&file);
00305 
00306     //Style
00307     QString rowEnd(" \\\\ ");
00308     QString rowSeparator("\\hline ");
00309 
00310     // \begin{tabluar}{l|l|l|l|l}
00311     stream<<"\\begin{tabular}{l";
00312     for( int i = columnCount(); i > 1; --i )
00313         stream<<"|l";
00314     stream<<"}\n";
00315 
00316     // open &eval &stuff...
00317     QString output = m_trace->s_columnNames.join( "\t&" );
00318     output.replace( "a,B", "$\\alpha,\\beta$" );
00319     stream<<output;
00320     stream<<rowEnd;
00321 
00322     // All the lines
00323     QList<QStringList> grid = gridFromTrace(m_trace);
00324     QStringList curLine;
00325     foreach( curLine, grid )
00326     {
00327         // If the first and second cells are empty then consider it a depth
00328         // seperation in the grid.
00329         if( curLine[0].isEmpty() && curLine[1].isEmpty() )
00330             stream<<rowSeparator;
00331         else
00332         {
00333             if( !curLine[0].isEmpty() )
00334                 stream<<rowSeparator;
00335             stream<<rowSeparator<<"\n";
00336 
00337             output = curLine.join( "\t&" );
00338             output.replace( "-INF", "$-\\infty$");
00339             output.replace( "INF", "$\\infty$");
00340 
00341             // Change [...] to <...>
00342             output.replace( "[", "<" );
00343             output.replace( "]", ">" );
00344 
00345             // Change {...} to [...]
00346             output.replace( "{", "[" );
00347             output.replace( "}", "]" );
00348 
00349             // Change <...> to \framebox{...}
00350             output.replace( "<", "\\framebox{" );
00351             output.replace( ">", "}" );
00352 
00353             output.replace( "\\", "\\\\" );
00354             output.replace( "&", "\\&" );
00355             output.replace( "%", "\\%" );
00356 
00357             // Push it to the file and end the line/row
00358             stream<<output;
00359             stream<<rowEnd;
00360         }
00361     }
00362     stream<<"\n\\end{tabular}";
00363 }

00365 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00366 /// CTreeTraceView::setGraphModel
00367 ///
00368 /// @description  This is a setter for the Graph Model that is traced.
00369 /// @pre          None
00370 /// @post         The graph model is set to model and a retrace is issued.
00371 ///
00372 /// @param model: This is the new model.
00373 ///
00374 /// @limitations  None
00375 ///
00376 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00377 void CTreeTraceView::setGraphModel( CTreeGraphModel *model )
00378 {
00379     m_graphModel = model;
00380     connect( model, SIGNAL(retrace()), this, SLOT(retrace()) );
00381     retrace();
00382 }
